<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  NewFeatures.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a33f9f862dca8ee0f23bff5941bf433d8">setBit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a730efbdf567efc36a1d05cac8a9d3728">kSanitizerBinaryMetadataUARHasSizeBit</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.setMetadata(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LLVMContext::MD&#95;pcsections,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MDB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdbuilder/#a6022d366369fcd539dadfaefc80927db">createPCSections</a>(&#123;&#123;Section.getString(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             &#123;IRB.getInt(NewFeatures), IRB.getInt32(Size)&#125;&#125;&#125;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
